item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Adrian Ordonez. I am a Software Engineer turned DevOps Engineer. I grew up learning about computers from my IT Director father. Computers and technology has become my biggest passion and hobby and I feel amazingly lucky to have my biggest passion as my day job. I’m always learning new things and this blog is going to be my main platform for sharing what I learn. I’ll be covering topics ranging from software development in C#, Rust, TypeScript, to CICD tools, to Docker and Kubernetes, to HomeLabbing, and much much more.
